C

canCastle(Direction, Color) - Method in class chessboard.Board
Method which checks whether the active player can castle, which should be true only if neither the king nor the left rook has moved, the king is not in check, and the space to the side of the king is not under threat, and none of the spaces required are occupied.
Capture - Class in chessboard.moves
Class representing a capture, which is a move where a piece moves onto another piece and removes it from the board.

captured - Variable in class chessboard.moves.Capture
